House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04734
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DISALLOWING HOSPITAL BILLS COMPUTED BASED ON ROOM RATE FOR PATIENTS AVAILING OF ASSISTANCE FROM THE PHILIPPINE CHARITY SWEEPSTAKES OFFICE THEREBY PRESCRIBING A UNIFORM BILLING SPECTRUM ON NEEDY PATIENTS
ABSTRACT : Intends to aid poor and needy patients in availing assistance from the PCSO by lowering the cost of hospital bills through prohibition in using private room rate as basis in charging hospital expenses.
ALIAS NAME : "Poor Patients' Equity Act"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-09-20
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
